word_mean: 围口部，口缘：某些原生动物胞口延伸出来的一条沟

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生活时,海盘车向下的一面,中央盘的中央有口,口的周围为膜质的围口部(peristome),这一面称为口面(oral surface)。相对的一面,即上表面称为反口面(aboral.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from modern Latin peristoma, from Greek peri- 'around' + stoma 'mouth'

means.word_mean: 1. (botany) fringe of toothlike appendages surrounding the mouth of a moss capsule
2. region around the mouth in various invertebrates

auth_sentence.content: The "rim" of the cup or peristome is often colourful, it is thought, to catch the eye of passing bugs.
